NGX Blueboard LPC1768-H
================================

To build for the Blueboard, compile with the flag ``PLATFORM=BLUEBOARD``.

UART
----

Identical to the :doc:`Ford prototype <ford>`.

Debug Logging
-------------

On the Blueboard LPC1768H, logging will be on UART0 (Pin P0.3 - Rx, Pin P0.2 -
Tx) at 115200 baud.

LED Lights
----------

Currently LEDs are not supported on the Blueboard
